name: SafeFreeze
0:
”Alexa open safe freeze”
”Set up my device”
”What is the temperature in the kitchen freezer?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: safe freeze
des: When used with SafeFreeze temperature monitoring devices, the user can simply ask Alexa for temperature or humidity readings from multiple devices. The skill allows the user to quickly and easily set up their device(s), assigning unique names to each device. Once configured, the skill will remember the settings so the user can use the device name to retrieve a current temperature or humidity reading anytime the skill has been opened.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
